post:
Hi Folks,

Quick and short offer, for the next 10 or so orders a free dedicated IPv4 address will be automatically given on any Netherlands <a href="http://littlehappycloud.net">LittleHappyCloud.net</a> product.

<img src="http://i.imgur.com/1o7U2G1.png" />

There is also 50% off for 3 months any standard Xen or OpenVZ product (excludes lowendspirit) with coupon code '201650off' while it will work with any package a good example is the <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=22">UK</a> or <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=21">NL</a>  OpenVZ 1GB plans which will only cost €1.00 p/month while the offer lasts.


HAPPY NEW YEAR!

Anthony.
